entities.name: mad-eye moody
entities.description: Mentioned as the one who will benefit from the collected pus. ("This'll keep Madam Pomfrey happy")

entities.name: professor sprout
entities.description: The teacher who is instructing the students on how to collect bubotuber pus. ("Pus, Finnigan, pus," said Professor Sprout)

entities.name: seamus finnigan
entities.description: A student who is revolted by the task of collecting bubotuber pus. ("The what?" said Seamus Finnig an, sounding revolted.)

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Mentioned as someone who will benefit from the collected pus. ("This'll keep Madam Pomfrey happy")

entities.name: hannah abbott
entities.description: A Hufflepuff student who mentions Eloise Midgeon. ("Like poor Eloise Mi dgen," said Hannah Abbott)

entities.name: eloise midegon
entities.description: Mentioned as someone who has resorted to desperate measures to get rid of pimples. ("Like poor Eloise Mi dgen")

entities.name: bubotuber pus
entities.description: A valuable substance that is collected from the bubotubers. ("Pus, Finnigan, pus," said Professor Sprout, "and it's extremely valuable, so don't waste it.)

relationships.description: Madam Pomfrey will benefit from the collected bubotuber pus. ("This'll keep Madam Pomfrey happy")
Professor Sprout is teaching about bubotuber pus and how to collect it. ("Pus, Finnigan, pus," said Professor Sprout)
Seamus Finnigan is revolted by the task of collecting bubotuber pus. ("The what?" said Seamus Finnig an, sounding revolted.)
Hannah Abbott mentions Eloise Midgeon in the context of desperate measures to get rid of pimples. ("Like poor Eloise Mi dgen")
